name: WARPZONE DRIFTER 2
description:
With full throttle and no breaks, WARPZONE DRIFTER 2 is a minimalistic, retro-hardcore, physics-based drifter minigame.

You control a car that has to pass through three checkpoints before teleporting to the next warpzone. How many times you can teleport in 2 minutes is your score. There is a creature hunting you.

Players can expect old-school gameplay with a simple objective and a difficult challenge.
